## SafientMain.syncSafe property

This function creates a new safe by the safe beneficiary

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
syncSafe: (creatorAddress: string, safeId: string, claimType: ClaimType, signalingPeriod: number, metaevidenceURI: string, value: string) => Promise<TransactionResponse>;
```
